name: Whispering Voices Demo
description:
In “Whispering Voices” you are playing the genderfluid student named “Mable York” who lost their friend in a car accident a short time ago. Because of sorrow and the feeling of guilt, they are afraid of attending the funeral the next day wherefore they´re going to their best friend’s room in their flatshare, unknowing they went to the horror of their own mind and hallucinations.

A tutorial level of a psychic walk trough game created in the short amount of time of one month by the team Brain in Glass in their 4th Semester.
